projects.name: Bitcoin Hyper
projects.desc: Bitcoin Hyper is a Bitcoin fork designed for 2025, combining staking rewards, fast transaction finality, and Solana-level speeds while maintaining Bitcoin's security ethos. It uses a hybrid consensus model (Proof of Stake plus Nakamoto-style checkpoints) and is the first Bitcoin Layer-2 to integrate Solana's speed. Developed by a team linked to Bitcoin Cash and Stacks, it targets scalability and utility for next-generation payments.

projects.name: Vault AI
projects.desc: Vault AI merges artificial intelligence with decentralized finance (DeFi) tools on its own blockchain, aiming to automate and optimize DeFi strategies using AI-driven analytics. The project is in presale and targets early adopters interested in AI-blockchain integration.

projects.name: Qubetics
projects.desc: Qubetics focuses on tokenizing real estate and intellectual property (IP), allowing fractional ownership and liquidity for traditionally illiquid assets. The project has raised $14.5M in presale and is positioned as a platform for real-world asset tokenization.

projects.name: Web3Bay
projects.desc: Web3Bay is an e-commerce platform that leverages blockchain for secure transactions and offers 5% discounts to users who pay with its native 3BAY token. It aims to reimagine online shopping with decentralized payment incentives.

projects.name: Cogni AI
projects.desc: Cogni AI allocates 50% of its tokens to presale and develops AI solutions for natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) on blockchain. Its focus is on decentralized AI model training and deployment.

projects.name: Lightchain AI
projects.desc: Lightchain AI introduces a novel 'Proof of Intelligence' consensus mechanism, reserving 40% of tokens for early investors. It aims to create a blockchain where AI agents validate transactions, blending distributed ledger tech with machine learning.

projects.name: Solaxy
projects.desc: Solaxy is a Layer-2 scaling solution for Solana, designed to boost throughput and reduce costs for dApps. It has secured $22M in presale and completed a third-party audit, focusing on scalability and reliability for Solana-based projects.
